EmailTemplate.description: Response for Nov 2012 risk roundtable webinar on litigation holds
EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Nov12 Risk Roundtable Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}:
Thank you for registering for the Information Security Trends Webinar. The login details are below.
Title: Managing Litigation Holds Date: Wednesday, November 7 Time: 8am Pacific / 11am Eastern Duration: 1 hour 15 mionutes
Video:
Conference URL: http://www.infiniteconferencing.com/Events/intapp/ Participant Code: 97447854
Audio:
US/Canada Audio Dial In: (888) 567-1603 UK Audio Dial In: 00 800 4747 4646 (You will not need to give the operator a passcode, just the title of the webinar)
